body: Hi i live in the uk and last night my brother, who is 5 years older than me, installed hacks and got me banned from 6 different server including avic what is my favourite server so i would love it if you can unban me cause Im am really upset and all my mates play nebula and Im just left out now so it would be epic you can unban me from avic and I will get back to playing with my mates. Thank you tombo58

title: Unbanning me?

replies.body: If you wish to appeal your punishment, then please send your appeal to support@avicus.net. Keep in mind you most likely will not be unbanned due to the fact that it is your account, and it is your responsibility. If someone "gets into your account and installs hacks", in this case your brother, it will probably not suffice. Change your password and do not give siblings your account information.
replies.body_tagged: If you wish to appeal your punishment, then please send your appeal to support@avicus.net. Keep in mind you most likely will not be unbanned due to the fact that it is your account, and it is your responsibility. If someone "gets into your account and installs hacks", in this case your brother, it will probably not suffice. Change your password and do not give siblings your account information.

replies.body: You are responsible for your own account. And i HIGHLY doubt that that your brother did that.

replies.body:
Your account, your responsibility.
It's like saying "OH, since my dog got loose and mauled your dog to death, it's not my fault, since my DOG did it, not me!"
